thread.section_title: The Nadler Victoria - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely and friendly
thread.title_full: Lovely and friendly - Review of The Nadler Victoria, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Maura C
title: Lovely and friendly
text: We came to London for a week and while adjusting to the time change and inherent confusion of getting to know a new city, we were helped and supported by the amazing staff here. Everything from bringing me a cappuccino they prepared to making sure we knew where we were going. So many friendly faces! It meant a lot especially because it rained all week; they gave us sunshine. The room was great, too. I needed a bathtub and got one. Warm baths in London! Really happy here. Thank you, Nader.
